Title: Shaun of the Dead
Overview: Shaun lives a supremely uneventful life, which revolves around his girlfriend, his mother, and, above all, his local pub. This gentle routine is threatened when the dead return to life and make strenuous attempts to snack on ordinary Londoners.
Keywords: record collection, flower, cheese, pub, surrey, romantic comedy, zombie, english, tv show in film, cricket bat, broken bottle, survival horror, british pub, english pub, you've got red on you
production_companies: Universal Pictures, Big Talk Productions, StudioCanal, Film4, Working Title Films, WT2 Productions, De Wolfe Music, Inside Track 2
Cast: Simon Pegg, Nick Frost, Kate Ashfield
